Naruto and Sasuke jump high into the sky, manifesting their Kurama cloak and Complete Body — Susanoo, respectively. Sakura completely releases her [[Strength of a Hundred Seal]], and jumps even higher into the sky, gathering a massive amount of chakra in her fist. The three connect their attacks on the opponent, Sakura from above, Naruto and Sasuke from each side respectively.

== Trivia ==
* This technique appears to be inspired by [[Team Kakashi|Team 7]]'s last attack on [[Kaguya]]. Additionally, Naruto and Sasuke's attacks resemble the collision during their final battle, which first appeared in a two-page spread from [[Naruto and Sasuke 2|chapter 695]].
